attributes.action: Boycot sudanese goods until Omar Al Bashir is brought to justice
attributes.additional_details:
Omar Al Bashir is the President of Sudan despite  being wanted by the International Criminal Court for 5 counts of Crimes against Humanity, 2 counts of War Crimes and 3 counts of Genocide.

 We believe stronger sanctions against the Sudanese government will put further pressure on Sudans' regime and kick start a stronger international response so he can finally be brought to justice.
